attributes.action: Make sure centre assessed grades are given to students fairly.
attributes.additional_details: Because it effects me and many students in my year group.
attributes.background: List specific requirements that schools have to meet in the process of giving centre assessed grades.

rejection.details:
The Government has published guidance on awarding qualifications in summer 2021: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021

This sets out evidence that can be used to make assessments, how schools and colleges should undertake quality assurance, and rights to appeals.
